"Autoguns, Blizzard and Twister, reconized as friends." Sinesis said, hopin=
g his words would work on the base although he was never granted the access=
 to let new members into the Predacons as far as he knew.

OCC: Go ahead, p=
ick up Sinesis, I do not mind...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: il=
ovealllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 10:1=
6 PM
  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Blizzard sighs when Sinesis punches=
 himself* Blizzard: Twister! Get back here and help! *Blizzard yells out to=
 Twister who was heading for the base* Twister: Your not the boss of me!!!!=
! *Twister says and than runs towards the Pred base but is shot by the auto=
 guns. She backs out of the range of the auto guns after being shot several=
 times* Twister: SLAG!


  *Blizzard sighs and tries to pick Sinesis up*
  =
  ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@egroups.c=
om 
    Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 8:29 PM
    Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars=



    "Yeah, I got all of him, unfortunently." Sinesis said, taking Blizza=
rd's hand and trying to get up. He is unable and he hits himself in the fac=
e...
      ----- Original Message ----- 
      From: ilovealllizards 
     =
 To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
      Sent: Friday, July 14, 2000 4:43 PM
      Su=
bject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


      *Blizzard bends down* Blizzard: Do you ha=
ve all of Sinister? *Blizzard says to Sinesis*
        ----- Original Messa=
ge ----- 
        From: THECODE 
        To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
        Se=
nt: Friday, July 14, 2000 4:04 AM
        Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


   =
     "Fine, but don't be surprised if I kill you!" Sinesis said to Blizzard=
, coughing a few times.

        "Ah, never mind that last sentence, I need=
 help, too." Sinesis said...
          ----- Original Message ----- 
      =
    From: ilovealllizards 
          To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
          Sent=
: Thursday, July 13, 2000 12:36 AM
          Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


=
          *Blizzard stopped reaching for Sinister's pieces when she saw Sin=
esis picking his parts up* Blizzard: Please let me help... *Blizzard says t=
o Sinesis*
            ----- Original Message ----- 
            From: THEC=
ODE 
            To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
            Sent: Thursday, July 1=
3, 2000 12:14 AM
            Subject: Neo Beast Wars


            Deemos h=
elps Inzola back to their ship and he starts to repair her, but to no avail=
. Deemos, very hurt himself, went to the Predacon base.

            "My wi=
fe, you see she in hurt, and I need to use your CR Chambers, I have been to=
ld that this is the base of the mighty Hell Beast, how can I help you, Hell=
 Beast? Just heal Inzola and myself!" Deemos called out to Anyone in Hell B=
east's base.

            Sinesis slowly crawled along, pushing Sinister's =
parts. Sinesis stopped every mile to catch his breath, his jets her wrecked=
. He kept going and going and going.

            Plintissa seen a letter f=
rom Dracona, saying she had retruned to base. Plintissa shrugged and walked=
 along her way. Artist tripped her up and walked on ahead. Plintissa felt l=
ike crying again, this is the one she loved? Artist laughed and went on his=
 way.

            Dracona picked up the device, but suddenly, the device e=
xploded, sending a fireball into the Predacon base. (Megatron's base) Draco=
na gasped. She had better be going now. She slowly started to sneak away.

=
            The Radicons hurried on their way, maybe some other team would =
apreciate their skills, like the Alliance. Airbomber just hoped that Infect=
ra would come with them.

            Lightmare's spark joined the Matrix, =
she is DEAD.

            Gangon's spark hovered in front of BrightBlade, s=
wirling around her over and over again.
